column6: SPIRAL begins here!  The underworld is in a constant flux and has been since the Kingpin got taken out at SHADOWLAND. That war is heating up and Spidey's going to do something about it. But he's not the only one-- Police Captain Yuri Watanabe is trying to curtail the madness both in her day job as a police office and as the vigilante THE WRAITH! Do she and Spidey play by the same rules?
column8: | penciller (cover):Arthur Adams | artist:Carlo Barberi | writer:Gerry Conway
